text: Museum of Oriental Art may refer to: * State Museum of Oriental Art, a museum in Moscow * Museum of Oriental Art (Turin), a museum in Turin * National Museum of Oriental Art, a museum in Rome * Museum of Oriental Art "Bratko", a museum in Korçë * Museum of Western and Oriental Art, a museum in Kiev * Durham University Oriental Museum, a museum in Durham * Edoardo Chiossone Museum of Oriental Art, a museum in Genoa
title: Museum of Oriental Art
